ModulePrefs.title: Virtual Biology Lab - Estimating Plant Biodiversity
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: This model simulates MacArthur & Wilson's 1963 Island Biogeography Equilibrium paper. You can run virtual experiments manipulating the following: island size, distance from mainland, habitat type, and species types (e.g. birds, arthropods, etc.).
